subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
; Etymology 1
: {{Han compound|人|alt1=亻|却|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=man; person|no_och2=1}}.
; Etymology 2
: Variant of {{zh-l|*𠊬}} by analogy ({{zh-l|*卻}} → {{zh-l|*却}}).

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=却,𠳞,屐}}
From {{zh-l|*佢|he; she; it}}, with -''k'' (plural marker) and tone change ({{zh-ref|Gan, 1997}}). Compare {{zh-l|*偌|you (plural)}}, from {{zh-l|*你|you (singular)}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text: {{zh-see|𠊬|v}} <!-- Note: Not the simplified form of 𠊬 - 㑢/𠊬 not found in https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/通用規范漢字表 -->

subSections.title: References
subSections.text:
